entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:50 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.6°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
